title: Jerry Garcia and John Kahn - 1982-06-27 - Late Show - Tower Thea
description:
Jerry Garcia and John Kahn
06-27-1982 
Late Show
Tower Theatre
Upper Darby, PA


Source:  MSC> Cx > WAV > FLAC

Flaws:
Clipping at the start of:
- I've Been All Around This World
- Sing Me Back Home
- Oh Babe, It Ain't No Lie
- Ripple


--- Late show (complete) ---

01 Deep Elem Blues
02 I've Been All Around This World
03 Jack-A-Roe
04 Bird Song
05 Sing Me Back Home
06 Gomorrah
07 Oh Babe, It Ain't No Lie
08 Run For The Roses
09 Ripple

--- Encore ---
10 Dire Wolf 



Despite the informational gaps in the lineage, this is a fine sounding 
source and a clean transfer.

The recording is typical of the '82 Garcia/Kahn soundboards: a clear, 
warm tape with a fair amount of audience presence mixed in. As usual,
the recordist appears to have paused the master between most tracks. 
As a result some track starts are clipped as noted above.

The set was normalized as one long track, then split for crossfading to
soften the sudden tape pauses. No music was edited - clipped starts were
not faded, only crowd sound.


Editing, transfer and initial seeding by Mr. Completely March 2013.

Thanks to Chris T. for the tape.

Dedicated to the memory of brother Jon Mirsky.
